name: GD AutoBot Backtracker (Engine)
description: Deterministic engine-fast-forward backtracking bot (tap by default, hold when needed)

inner-budget-ms.name: Inner Budget (ms)
inner-budget-ms.description: Limits CPU time per rendered frame so the game doesn't freeze.

max-frames.name: Max Frames Per Attempt
max-frames.description: Failsafe: restart if attempt runs too long.

tap-length.name: Tap Length (frames)
tap-length.description: Tap duration for cube-like inputs and default search duration.

max-shift.name: Max Shift (frames)
max-shift.description: Search shifts a segment by 0, -1, +1, -2, +2 ... up to this.

insert-offset.name: Insert Offset (frames)
insert-offset.description: If no segment is near the frontier, insert one at (frontier - offset).

window.name: Backtrack Window (frames)
window.description: Only modify segments starting within [center-window, center].

prefix-lock.name: Prefix Lock (frames)
prefix-lock.description: Never modify segments that start earlier than (bestFrame - window - prefixLock).

verify-after-win.name: Verify After Win
verify-after-win.description: After first win, replay best at normal speed to confirm.
